quote: "Protect and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development"
sentence1: Over 3 billion people depend on marine and coastal biodiversity for their livelihoods.
sentence2: Yet, oceans are now more acidic than ever before, and plastic pollution is reaching epidemic proportions.
sentence3: Marine protected areas need to be effectively managed and well-resourced to ensure the survival of our planet's blue heart.
caption1: We must protect endangered species such as sea turtles, coral reefs and marine mammals from overfishing, habitat destruction and climate change.
caption2: 80% of marine pollution comes from land-based activities. Reducing plastic use, proper waste management and sustainable consumption can reverse this trend.
